channel.title: Dungeon World - The Gloom
channel.description:
Dungeon World (PBTA) Jan-Feb Fantasy Adventure :crossed_swords: Celtic Otherworld Setting :goat:
* Powered by the Apocalyse system, 4 players, 3 hour sessions. * Open Access on 8th January. * The game will be recorded on Youtube. * THE X-CARD will also be in use. * Will be multiple sessions, will try to weave in ongoing/non-ongoing stories in fun ways.
- https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MPv3lgnaPEaqs40bvVV - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MPv453evqnkCY88jJIA - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MPv59TGDBVNT1Xk32A1 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MPv5JKdG7DAUCS9XW2E
